name: Pink Onion
author: Holly T.
description: Upon entering I was in awe of the fish mural on the wall and the selection of music. What a great ambiance! If you're looking for amazing hometown service, come here to kick back and taste some of the best pizza out there. Locals are running this place and it has a cozy feel for any night of the week! This is a prime example of business owners living their dreams and making it happen. Highly recommended.
